resources.string: Error Code: 001 - We couldn\'t fetch your account information. Please check your Google account and internet connection then try again later…
Error Code: 002 - An error occurred while logging in. Please check your internet connection and try again later…
Error Code: 002 - Process aborted by user…
Sign-in is successful. Your account is creating. We will start soon.…
iPost is a personal assistant which replies your events for you! You can plan new event and responses to save your time.
To get started, please sign-in with your Google account.
iPost needs calendar permission to show, update, delete and schedule events for replying.\\n\\nAll events saved on only this device so you can be sure that no one see your informations.
iPost needs to be synchroized with your contacts to create events or schedule post friends or colleagues etc.\\n\\nYour information only saved on device so accept you no one can access your data.
iPost is personal planner. You can reply events via E-mail, Whastapp, Facebook Messenger or SMS. iSend needs SMS permission for any future usage of SMS channel to reply events.
iPost needs to be authorized with Messenger to create messenger posts.\\n\\nWe will not collect any data from your Facebook account.
Action requiered: Click here to send Whatsapp message.
You chose past time. Post will not be triggered.
If you want to remove all events in iPost and retrieve them again, clcik the button below
If you want to remove all contacts in iPost and retrieve them again, click the button below
You can see status of connected accounts here. You can change them on \'Connected accounts\'.
You can add new event clicking gold circle plus button. After that, event edit page will be opened.
How can I changed the theme?
From the left menu, click the Themes button.
Click your profile from opening screen. After that you will see profile page and there are two buttons on there. You can using these buttons, you can update your friends or events.
How to delete my iPost account?
Easy! Just delete app and all your datas will be removed forever! Don\'t forget, your events are stored on this device only. If you remove the app, you will lose your information permanently.
How can I see my planned and sent posts?
You can see all pending and sent post on left menu. From left menu, you can see planned and sent under posts section.
